title: IS_BIT_SET
content:
0xA921AA820C25702F0x902E26AC// IsBitSet
BOOL IS_BIT_SET(int address, int offset);Returns bit's boolean state from [offset] of [address].
Example:
MISC::IS_BIT_SET(bitAddress, 1);
To enable and disable bits, see:
MISC::SET_BIT(&bitAddress, 1);   // enable
MISC::CLEAR_BIT(&bitAddress, 1); // disable
codeBlocks:
// IsBitSet
BOOL IS_BIT_SET(int address, int offset);

Returns bit's boolean state from [offset] of [address].
Example:
MISC::IS_BIT_SET(bitAddress, 1);
To enable and disable bits, see:
MISC::SET_BIT(&bitAddress, 1);   // enable
MISC::CLEAR_BIT(&bitAddress, 1); // disable
